Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Exceptions
  • Annotation Types
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.endpoint.StaticEndpointGroup
    Use EndpointGroup.of(EndpointGroup...).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.DefaultHttpRequest
    Use HttpRequest.streaming(RequestHeaders).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.DefaultHttpResponse
    Use HttpResponse.streaming().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.DeferredHttpResponse
    Use HttpResponse.from(CompletionStage).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.EventLoopThreadFactory
    Use ThreadFactories.newEventLoopThreadFactory(String, boolean) or ThreadFactories.builder(String). Note that setting ThreadFactoryBuilder.eventLoop(boolean) true is required to create event loop threads, e.g. ThreadFactories.builder("myThreadNamePrefix").eventLoop(true).build().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries
    Use Flags instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.healthcheck.HttpHealthCheckService
    Use HealthCheckService.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.healthcheck.ManagedHttpHealthCheckService
    Use HealthCheckService.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.AccessLogWriters
    Use the factory methods in AccessLogWriter.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.structured.kafka.StructuredLogJsonKafkaSerializer
    Use daniel-shuy/kafka-jackson-serializer.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.structured.StructuredLog
    Use AccessLogWriter.
  • Exceptions 
    Exceptions Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClosedClientFactoryException
    IllegalStateException with a message will be raised.
  • Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.annotation.ConsumeType
    Use Consumes.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.annotation.ConsumeTypes
    Use ConsumesGroup.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.annotation.ProduceType
    Use Produces.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.annotation.ProduceTypes
    Use ProducesGroup.
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientDecoration.NONE
    Use ClientDecoration.of().
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientFactory.DEFAULT
    Use ClientFactory.ofDefault().
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOption.DEFAULT_MAX_RESPONSE_LENGTH
    Use ClientOption.MAX_RESPONSE_LENGTH;
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOption.DEFAULT_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
    Use ClientOption.RESPONSE_TIMEOUT_MILLIS.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOption.DEFAULT_WRITE_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
    Use ClientOption.WRITE_TIMEOUT_MILLIS.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOptions.DEFAULT
    Use ClientOptions.of().
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.retry.RetryStrategy.defaultBackoff
    Use Backoff.ofDefault().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpHeaders.EMPTY_HEADERS
    Use HttpHeaders.of().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging.RequestLogBuilder.NOOP
    This field will be removed without a replacement. Use DefaultRequestLog or a mock.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_BINARY
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.BINARY. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_COMPACT
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.COMPACT. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_JSON
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.JSON. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_TEXT
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.TEXT. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker.AbstractCircuitBreakerClientBuilder.circuitBreakerMapping​(CircuitBreakerMapping)
    Use AbstractCircuitBreakerClientBuilder.mapping(CircuitBreakerMapping).
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientFactoryBuilder.socketOption​(ChannelOption<T>, T)
    Use ClientFactoryBuilder.channelOption(ChannelOption, Object).
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOptions.defaultMaxResponseLength()
    Use ClientOptions.maxResponseLength().
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOptions.defaultResponseTimeoutMillis1()
    Use ClientOptions.responseTimeoutMillis().
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientOptions.defaultWriteTimeoutMillis()
    Use ClientOptions.writeTimeoutMillis().
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.ClientRequestContextBuilder.of​(HttpRequest)
    Use ClientRequestContext.builder(HttpRequest).
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.endpoint.healthcheck.AbstractHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder.healthCheckPort​(int)
    Use AbstractHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder.port(int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.Endpoint.of​(String, int, int)
    Use Endpoint.of(String, int) and Endpoint.withWeight(int), e.g. Endpoint.of("foo.com", 80).withWeight(500).
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.logging.LoggingClient.newDecorator​(LogLevel)
    Use LoggingClient.builder().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.AbstractRequestContext.setTimedOut()
    Use DefaultServiceRequestContext.setTimedOut().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.Cookies.copyOf​(Iterable<? extends Cookie>)
    Use Cookies.of(Iterable).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpData.of​(byte[])
    Use HttpData.wrap(byte[]).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpData.offset()
    The offset of HttpData is always 0.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpRequest.of​(AggregatedHttpRequest)
    Use AggregatedHttpRequest.toHttpRequest().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponse.of​(AggregatedHttpResponse)
    Use AggregatedHttpResponse.toHttpResponse().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponse.ofFailed​(Throwable)
    Use HttpResponse.ofFailure(Throwable).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.HttpResponseWriter.respond​(int)
    Use HttpResponse.of(int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging.LoggingDecoratorBuilder.failedResponseLogLevel()
    It will be removed in the future.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging.LoggingDecoratorBuilder.requestLogLevel()
    It will be removed in the future.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging.LoggingDecoratorBuilder.successfulResponseLogLevel()
    It will be removed in the future.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging.RequestLog.host()
    Do not use this method. Get the remote or local address from RequestLog.context() or get the authority from RequestLog.authority().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.metric.MoreMeters.summaryWithDefaultQuantiles​(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable<Tag>)
    Use MoreMeters.newDistributionSummary(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.metric.MoreMeters.timerWithDefaultQuantiles​(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable<Tag>)
    Use MoreMeters.newTimer(MeterRegistry, String, Iterable).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.isTimedOut()
    Use ServiceRequestContext.isTimedOut().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.makeContextAware​(FutureListener<T>)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.onEnter​(Runnable)
    Use RequestContext.onEnter(Consumer) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.onExit​(Runnable)
    Use RequestContext.onExit(Consumer) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.push​(RequestContext)
    Use RequestContext.push().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.rejectPromise​(Promise<?>, Throwable)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.resolvePromise​(Promise<?>, Object)
    Use CompletableFuture instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.Response.closeFuture()
    Use Response.completionFuture().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.fromMediaType​(String)
    Use SerializationFormat.find(MediaType...).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.ofThrift()
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.values().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.stream.StreamMessage.closeFuture()
    Use StreamMessage.completionFuture() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.stream.StreamMessage.drainAll​(boolean)
    Use StreamMessage.drainAll(SubscriptionOption...).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.stream.StreamMessage.subscribe​(Subscriber<? super T>, boolean)
    Use StreamMessage.subscribe(Subscriber, SubscriptionOption...).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.EventLoopGroups.serverChannelClass​(EventLoopGroup)
    Use EventLoopGroups.serverChannelType(EventLoopGroup).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries.isEpollAvailable()
    Use Flags.useEpoll() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries.isOpenSslAvailable()
    Use Flags.useOpenSsl() instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries.report()
    This method will be removed without a replacement, because the information about the availability of the native libraries are now logged automatically by Flags.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.Sampler.rateLimited​(int)
    Use Sampler.rateLimiting(int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.TextFormatter.appendEpoch​(StringBuilder, long)
    Use TextFormatter.appendEpochMillis(StringBuilder, long).
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.TextFormatter.epoch​(long)
    Use TextFormatter.epochMillis(long).

    Use AbstractHttpService.doTrace(ServiceRequestContext, HttpRequest).

    Use HttpResult.trailers().

    Use DecoratingServiceBindingBuilder.pathPrefix(String).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.RouteBuilder.pathWithPrefix​(String, String)
    Use path(prefix, pathPattern)

    Use ServerBuilder.requestTimeout(Duration).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.defaultRequestTimeoutMillis​(long)
    Use ServerBuilder.requestTimeoutMillis(long).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.port​(int, String)
    Use ServerBuilder.http(int) or ServerBuilder.https(int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.serviceAt​(String, HttpService)
    Use ServerBuilder.service(String, HttpService) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.withDefaultVirtualHost()
    Use ServerBuilder.defaultVirtualHost().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.withVirtualHost​(String)
    Use ServerBuilder.virtualHost(String).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerConfig.accessLogWriter()
    Use ServiceConfig.accessLogWriter() or VirtualHost.accessLogWriter().

    Use ServiceConfig.maxRequestLength() or VirtualHost.maxRequestLength().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerConfig.defaultRequestTimeoutMillis()
    Use ServiceConfig.requestTimeoutMillis() or VirtualHost.requestTimeoutMillis().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerConfig.maxRequestLength()
    Use ServiceConfig.maxRequestLength() or VirtualHost.maxRequestLength().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerConfig.requestTimeoutMillis()
    Use ServiceConfig.requestTimeoutMillis() or VirtualHost.requestTimeoutMillis().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerConfig.shutdownAccessLogWriterOnStop()
    Use ServiceConfig.shutdownAccessLogWriterOnStop() or VirtualHost.shutdownAccessLogWriterOnStop().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerConfig.verboseResponses()
    Use ServiceConfig.verboseResponses() or VirtualHost.verboseResponses().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerPort.protocol()
    Use ServerPort.protocols().
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServiceBindingBuilder.pathUnder​(String)
    Use ServiceBindingBuilder.pathPrefix(String).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServiceConfig.loggerName()
    Use a logging framework integration such as RequestContextExportingAppender in armeria-logback.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServiceRequestContext.logger()
    Use a logging framework integration such as RequestContextExportingAppender in armeria-logback.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServiceRequestContext.negotiatedProduceType()
    Use ServiceRequestContext.negotiatedResponseMediaType().

    Use ServiceRequestContext.builder(HttpRequest).

    Use THttpService.builder().

    Use THttpService.builder().

    Use VirtualHostBuilder.service(String, HttpService) instead.

    Use VirtualHostDecoratingServiceBindingBuilder.pathPrefix(String).

    Use ThreadFactories#newEventLoopThreadFactory(String, false) or ThreadFactories.builder(String). Make sure to set ThreadFactoryBuilder.eventLoop(boolean) true to create event loop threads.
